title: Advisor

fields.name: The Advisor:
fields.value: You can only spawn when a **Neutral Public** role is present in the game. If there are multiple, you are assigned one at random. This individual is referred to as "NP" in the rest of this role card. You share a private chat with the NP that is open at all times.

fields.name: Assist or Desist:
fields.value: Each Evening Phase, you may choose for your true score * 1/4 to be added, subtracted, or neither towards the NP's effective score.

fields.name: Decipher Interactions:
fields.value: (x0, Charge 90%): Target a living player. You will know if they share a win condition with the NP. This ability fails if the player targeted dies tonight.

fields.name: Take Up Their Mantle (Passive):
fields.value: If the NP is Town-aligned, you may gain an ability or bonus if they die before you. If this exists, it will be mentioned in the NP's role card.

desc:
Post 146
*Do you really have our best interests in mind?* (Concept taken from Euclidian Norm's Valdie Mafia)
